629390.name: Diorama Worlds Demo
629390.description:
Build, Explore and Share worlds with a growing library of tiles and objects. Simple to use, easy to learn, fast to build.

Diorama Worlds is to not only be easy to use, but also quick to build using tiles and premade props. Decorate your world with as much or as little detail as you like.

All saves get uploaded to the cloud and can be viewed by anyone. As long as builders are playing, there will be new content to view daily. New models and skins will be added weekly.

Features:
Grid locks for tiles.
Rotation locks for buildings and trees.
Unlocked mode
Layers
Stop animation controls for posing characters.
Optional custom lighting.
Build and save custom objects.
View any diorama made by anyone.
